cards.name: Balon Greyjoy
cards.text: Pillage. Renown. Action: Kneel your faction card to choose a card in an opponent's discard pile and put it into play under your control. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, shuffle it into its owner's deck.

cards.name: Euron Crow's Eye
cards.text: Intimidate. Reaction: After you marshal Euron Crow's Eye, search your hand, deck, and discard pile for Silence and put it into play. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Asha Greyjoy
cards.text: Pillage. Stealth. Each other unique Ironborn character you control gains stealth.

cards.name: Andrik the Unsmiling
cards.text: Pillage. Reaction: After Andrik the Unsmiling discards a card using pillage, choose a non-limited location or attachment in the losing opponent's discard pile. Discard 1 copy of that card from play.

cards.name: Priest of Old Wyk
cards.text: While there is a Drowned God character in your dead pile, Priest of Old Wyk contributes its STR to your total for dominance even while kneeling.

cards.name: Eager Deckhand
cards.text: Reaction: After a Warship location enters play under your control, put Eager Deckhand into play from your hand.

cards.name: Orkmont Reaver
cards.text:
Pillage.
While an opponent has 10 or more cards in his or her discard pile, Orkmont Reaver gains stealth.

cards.name: Silence
cards.text: Challenges Action: Kneel Silence to put a Warship location into play from your hand. Then, if you control Euron Crow's Eye, stand him. +2 Initiative.

cards.name: Great Wyk
cards.text: Reaction: After a character enters play from your dead pile, each opponent chooses and discards 1 card from his or her hand. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Golden Storm
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge as the attacking player, kneel Golden Storm to choose and kill a participating character. Then, if you control a participating Raider character, stand Golden Storm.

cards.name: Scouting Vessel
cards.text: Interrupt: When a character you control discards a card using pillage, kneel and sacrifice Scouting Vessel to discard 3 cards instead.

cards.name: Fleet Captain
cards.text: Attached character gains the Captain trait and gets +1 STR. (+3 STR instead if you control 3 or more Warship locations.)

cards.name: What Is Dead May Never Die
cards.text: Reaction: After you win dominance, choose a [greyjoy] character in your dead pile and put it into play.

cards.name: Nighttime Raid
cards.text: Action: Choose up to 3 characters with pillage and/or the Raider trait. Until the end of the phase, each of those characters gains stealth.

cards.name: Khorane Sathmantes
cards.text: Action: Kneel Khorane Sathmantes and a Warship location to choose and kneel 1 character and 1 location.

cards.name: Desert Raider
cards.text: Reaction: After you lose a challenge, put Desert Raider into play from your dead pile and choose a character controlled by the winning opponent. That character gains 1 power. Until the end of the phase, that character loses an [intrigue] or [power] icon and Desert Raider gains that icon.

cards.name: When I Woke...
cards.text: Reaction: After a player loses a [military] challenge, that player chooses a participating character and places it on top of its owner's deck. (Max 1 per challenge.)

cards.name: Sea of Blood
cards.text: During [military] challenges, reduce the cost of each event you play by 1 for each blood token on Sea of Blood. You cannot play events during [intrigue] or [power] challenges. Reaction: After you win a [military] challenge by 5 or more STR, kneel your faction card to place a blood token on Sea of Blood. Then, search your deck for an event, reveal it, and add it to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: We Take Westeros!
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose a location in a discard pile and put it into play under your control.

cards.name: Coordinated Attack
cards.text: Reaction: After you win a challenge as the attacking player, choose a different challenge type. You may initiate an additional challenge of the chosen type this phase. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Stolen Message
cards.text: Each opponent plays with the top card of his or her deck revealed. Action: Pay 1 gold to place the top card of an opponent's deck on the bottom of that player's deck. (Limit 3 times per round.)

cards.name: Vanquish the Unbelievers
cards.text: Forced Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, choose a Trait. Kill each character you control that does not have that Trait (cannot be saved).
